Police Department
=================

The Falfurrias Police Department provides high-quality services focused on the community's public![Police Logo](https://www.falfurrias.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=209) safety and instilling confidence in all citizens of Falfurrias, Texas. Through its efforts, Falfurrias PD has prevented crime and improved the quality of life for its residents while treating the community with utmost respect, fairness, and integrity. Falfurrias PD is on watch and ready for response 24/7.
